meanings.definition: A person or company that refinishes furniture or other surfaces.
meanings.sent1: The refinishers did a great job restoring the old table.
meanings.sent2: We hired a team of refinishers to update our kitchen cabinets.
meanings.sent3: The refinishers turned the worn-out dresser into a shiny masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The refinishers were like artists, transforming the scratched desk into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the refinishers who brought new life to our wooden chairs.

meanings.definition: Plural form of the word 'refinisher', referring to multiple individuals or companies that refinish surfaces.
meanings.sent1: The refinishers in town are known for their quality work.
meanings.sent2: Many refinishers offer different styles and finishes for customers to choose from.
meanings.sent3: It was a funny sight to see a group of refinishers carrying a huge dining table down the street.
meanings.sent4: The refinishers worked together like a well-oiled machine, completing the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent5: The refinishers' workshop was filled with the sweet smell of varnish and paint.
